title: To establish a systematic mortgage modification program at the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, and for other purposes.
content: Systematic Foreclosure Prevention and Mortgage Modification Act - Directs the Chairperson of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) to establish a systematic foreclosure prevention and mortgage modification program by: (1) paying mortgage servicers $1,000 to cover expenses for each loan modified according to specified standards. And (2) sharing up to 50 of any losses incurred if a modified loan should subsequently re-default.
